title: Funding opportunity: Engineer next generation veterinary vaccine technology platforms
description: A joint BBSRC-Defra programme aims to fund ‘plug and play’ veterinary vaccine platforms, leveraging transformative technologies, interdisciplinary approaches, and cross-sector partnerships, focusing on entire platform technology pipeline from antigen discovery to delivery and underpinned by immunological understanding to address unmet veterinary vaccine needs. Projects must be led by UK research organisations eligible for BBSRC funding. The full economic cost (FEC) of your project will be up to £4 million. BBSRC will fund 80% of the FEC with a maximum of £3.2 million per project over a maximum of five years.
